resources.string: In this game, you need to find the same items on both cards as quickly as possible. Select the desired object on the card and go through the steps. Remember that time is limited

This is a bonus game to increase your reward for the level. Select the same cells on the playing field as quickly as possible. Remember that time is limited. The more cells you destroy, the greater the reward
If it seems to you that there are no identical elements on the cards, then shuffle them
On this day, you will experience mental lightness and a surge of positive emotions.
On this day, it would be nice to postpone all important things until tomorrow.
It is unlikely that anyone will be able to surprise or confuse you today.
Try to put aside anyone\'s claims or attempts to put pressure on you today.
This day promises to be very emotionally intense. Moreover, the most pleasant thing is that the emotions will be entirely positive.
Test your attentiveness! Find the same icons on the cards
Multiply your points in the mini-game
Complete all the levels and beat the record!
